Pro Audio Packages

Get your gig or event up and running effortlessly with our popular PA system packages, which include everything you need. Along with high-quality speakers, mixers, and microphones, we provide essential accessories such as audio and power cables, as well as stands for easy setup. Start your event smoothly and confidently with our comprehensive solutions.

  • 1 x Microphone Stand
  • 1 x 25 ft 1/4 inch TS Guitar Cable (optional)

Microphone Packages

In addition to our PA system packages, we offer separate microphone options to enhance your setup. You can easily expand your system by renting our microphone packages, which include both wired and wireless options. If you already have your own system and just need additional microphones, our microphone packages are available for standalone rental as well.

Wired Vocal

$10/day

  • 1 x Wired Vocal Microphone
  • 1 x 25 ft XLR Microphone Cable
  • 1 x Microphone Stand
  • Equipment: Shure SM58

Wired Instrument

$10/day

  • 1 x Wired Instrument Microphone
  • 1 x 25 ft XLR Microphone Cable
  • 1 x Microphone Stand
  • Equipment: Shure SM57

Wireless Vocal

$29/day

  • 1 x Wireless Vocal Microphone and Receiver
  • 1 x 6 ft XLR Microphone Cable
  • 1 x Microphone Stand
  • Equipment: Shure BLX24/SM58
